modName: Archmages hooded robes TO Hoodless ones
summary: This small plug-in makes the hoodless version of the robes Craftable at any forge. Only requirements are the original hooded robes.
descriptionHtml:
This small plug-in makes the hoodless version of the robes Craftable at any forge. Only requirements are the original hooded robes.

If you want the +50 magicka bonus, you will have to download a mod which fixes the hoodless robes. (In vanilla game, the hoodless version DOES NOT have the +50 magicka bonus.)

Installing instructions in the Archive, use WinRAR to open it.

The picture has a texture mod installed, if you want it, download it here:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=843
author: Rafalema
